coloredeffects.overlayColor.name: Overlay Icon Color
coloredeffects.overlayColor.hint: Color for overlay icons as a hex string (rrggbb)
coloredeffects.overlayAlpha.name: Overlay Icon Opacity
coloredeffects.overlayAlpha.hint: Opacity of overlay icons (0 = fully transparent, 1 = fully opaque)
coloredeffects.statusBackgroundColor.hin: Background color of status icons as a hex string (rrggbb)
coloredeffects.statusBackgroundAlpha.hin: Opacity of status icon background (0 = fully transparent, 1 = fully opaque)
coloredeffects.statusBorderColor.name: Status Icon Border Color
coloredeffects.statusBorderColor.hint: Color of status icon border as a hex string (rrggbb)
coloredeffects.statusBorderWidth.name: Status Icon Border Width
coloredeffects.statusBorderWidth.hint: Width in pixels of status icon border
coloredeffects.statusColor.name: Status Icon Color
coloredeffects.statusColor.hint: Color for status icons as a hex string (rrggbb)
coloredeffects.statusAlpha.name: Status Icon Opacity
coloredeffects.statusAlpha.hint: Opacity of status icons (0 = fully transparent, 1 = fully opaque)
